summary: You can now make Baskets and paper rolls
descriptionHtml:
I found it very frustrating to not be able to make paper rolls or baskets when using certain mods so this just adds recipes. Making a basket can be used with either Linen or Straw; Making rolls of paper requires more effort, you need ruined books of any kind and use them in a cooking pot to create mush, then go to a armor table and create rolls of paper.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />No scripting so it won't interfere, the worse that could happen is you'd find duplicate recipes in your menu if you have a mod that does something similar to this.
author: Daseneezequeen

files.name: Make Baskets and Rolls of paper
files.fileName: Make Baskets and Rolls of paper-50089-1-00.rar
